import React from "react" import axios from "axios" const baseUrl = "https://passgen-server.herokuapp.com/" class App extends React.Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { password: '' } } render() { return (


) } genBtn() { axios.post(baseUrl, {"amount": 8, "ll": true, "sl": false, "num": true, "sym": false}) .then((function(response){ console.log(response.data) })) .catch(function (error) { console.log(error) }) console.log('Ok') } } export default App
